description.value:
Your poisons are devastatingly potent. When you apply a simple poison with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Poison Weapon], the poison deals [[/r 4d4[poison]]] damage instead of 1d4 poison damage.

When you apply an injury poison to your weapon, the DC to resist that poison increases by 2, to a maximum of your class DC.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Deadly Poison Weapon]
